title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       At the National Mall and Memorial Parks, kids can become a Junior Ranger and earn their very own junior ranger badge!   Occasionally, special activities are available for kids. Check the Schedule of Park Events for upcoming ranger programs and junior ranger activities.        Youth Conservation Corps Want to work on the National Mall?  National Mall and Memorial Parks participates in the Youth Conservation Corps program which employs youth (ages 15-19) in National Parks across the country.  Complete this Medical History and Application to apply for a YCC position! Email us for more information!
